Thaddeus (3 - Healer feat).description: Your Shield of Faith no longer requires concentration; +1 duration step for Shield of Faith
Thaddeus (3 - Healer feat).upgrade: +1 duration step for Shield of Faith/1

Vehemir (2).description: Your Speak with Animals now allows beasts you are communicating with to access their entire life's memories, not just things they perceived recently; +3 animal handling when communicating via Speak with Animals
Vehemir (2).upgrade: +2 animal handling when communicating via Speak with Animals/1
